de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.cd
Class DistributionStrategyImpl

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.AbstractOverlayNode
      de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.overlay.cd.DistributionStrategyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, ComponentEventListener, ConnectivityListener, OperationCallback, SupportOperations, DistributionStrategy, OverlayNode, TransMessageListener
public class DistributionStrategyImpl
extends AbstractOverlayNode
implements TransMessageListener, DistributionStrategy

Very simple distribution strategy, which waits for incoming download requests and answers them as they come.

Version:
3.0, 30.11.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune

Method Detail

messageArrived

public void messageArrived(TransMsgEvent receivingEvent)
Description copied from interface: TransMessageListener
Upon receiving a transport message, the transport layer strips off the header information of this message and passes all relevant data to a given TransMessageListener in terms of TransMsgEvent.

Specified by:
messageArrived in interface TransMessageListener
Parameters:
receivingEvent - the TransMsgEvent containing all relevant data

Returns:

downloadDocument

public int downloadDocument(OverlayKey key,
                            java.util.List<TransInfo> peers,
                            OperationCallback callback)
Description copied from interface: DistributionStrategy
Calling this method will make the strategy to download the document identified by the given key from the given peers. Depending on the strategy implementation one, some or all of the provided peers will be involved.

Specified by:
downloadDocument in interface DistributionStrategy
Parameters:
key - - identifies the requested document
peers - - addresses of hosts which should have copies of the requested document
callback - - callback for this operation
Returns:
operation id

The address at which this strategy waits for incoming download requests.

Returns:
trans info address of this component.

createOperation

public AbstractOperation createOperation(java.lang.String opName,
                                         java.lang.String[] params,
                                         OperationCallback callback)
Description copied from interface: SupportOperations
Create an appropriate Operation. The component checks whether it can create an operation with the given name and number of parameters. This method is used only to specify operations via configuration (action) files.

Specified by:
createOperation in interface SupportOperations
Parameters:
opName - - operation name
params - - operation parameters if required.
callback - - caller Object which will be informed when the operation finishes (successfully or with a failure)
Returns:
operation - created (can be scheduled or executed immediately)
